paper_abstract: This paper presents a language called ScreenSpec that, can be used to quickly specify screens dining the requirements elicitation phase. Experiments and case studies presented in this paper show that it is easy to learn and effective to use ScreenSpec was successfully applied in 9 real projects Visual representation generated from ScreenSpec can lie attached to requirements specification (e g as adoinnents to use cases)
paper_title: ENHANCING USE CASES WITH SCREEN DESIGNS. A COMPARISON OF TWO APPROACHES
